bug.short_desc: IE8 fails to use "new Image" when running inside a popup window

long_desc.thetext:
This issue is only affecting IE8 whenever a qooxdoo app is running in a new popup window. Unfortunately I failed to create a generic example which demonstrates this bug.
Nevertheless, this odd behaviour has been registered by other developers. See
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1110406/ie-8-js-call-to-new-image-fails-when-the-code-is-run-in-a-popup-window
http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/iewebdevelopment/thread/5d32ec36-c640-40f6-a789-bcdbbf77c190
The affected classes in qooxdoo are
* qx.io.image.Preloader * qx.ui.basic.Image
Both use "new Image" to create a new image instance. If "document.createElement(img)" is used instead for IE 8 everything runs fine.
!! IMPORTANT !! Please keep in mind that IE 8 is recognized as IE 7 when running in Compatibility mode.
Also check if qooxdoo 0.8.x is affected.

Set all open 0.7.x-only issues that have no assignee to WONTFIX. This is in accordance with 0.7.x users like the RAP team. If you want to work on such an 0.7.x issue, feel free to reopen it and assign it to you. The issues should only exist in the legacy 0.7.x versions and be already resolved in qooxdoo 0.8 or above.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
